name: Sometimes I am small
description:
You can grow but also you can shrink. Choose wisely when to get small as you may not have a second chance!

Sometimes I am Small is a simple platformer game where you can get your character smaller to jump higher, be faster or simply go through little spaces to reach the goal

This is my entry for Godot Wild Jam from July 2020

I want to thank 0x72 as I'm using an Asset from the Dungeon tileset

https://0x72.itch.io/

Please If you like the game, leave a comment with your feedback. Also consider following me on Twitter

Thank you for visiting and playing my game

Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Jump - Space bar
  • Shrink / Grow - A key
  • Reset level - P key
